subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Checks for assignment of pattern variables.
subsection.p: Pattern variable assignment is considered bad programming practice. The pattern variable is meant to be a direct reference to the object being matched. Reassigning it can break this connection and mislead readers.

subsection.name: Violation Messages
subsection.p: All messages can be customized if the default message doesn't suit you. Please see the documentation to learn how to.
